summary: This is an email forwarding FBI 302 interview reports (likely from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force) for inclusion in the 3500 material for the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It indicates coordination between law enforcement and the prosecution team.

persons.name: aMIE
persons.context: Appears to be a member of the prosecution or legal team forwarding FBI 302 reports for the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Contractor
persons.context: Recipient of the email, tasked with adding the attached 302 reports to the 3500 material for the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: Sent the attached FBI 302 interview reports to the prosecution team.

connections.description: aMIE is instructing the contractor to add FBI 302 reports to the 3500 material for the Maxwell case.
The detective sent FBI 302 reports to aMIE, who then forwarded them to the contractor for case preparation.

events.title: Forwarding of FBI 302 reports for Maxwell case
events.description: Email correspondence forwarding FBI 302 interview reports from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force to be added to the 3500 material for the Ghislaine Maxwell prosecution.

locations: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force Office
keyFacts: FBI 302 interview reports were being forwarded for inclusion in the 3500 material for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The reports originated from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The email indicates ongoing case preparation and evidence sharing between law enforcement and the prosecution team in August 2021.
